00056         public function  __construct($id='') {
00057                 parent::__construct();
00058                 $this->table = $this->config->users['table'];
00059                 $this->encryption = $this->config->users['encryption'];
00060                 $this->domain = $this->domain == '' ? $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] : $this->domain;
00061                 $this->fields = $this->config->users['fields'];
00062                 if($this->config->users['session_name']){
00063                         $this->session = $this->config->users['session_name'];
00064                 }
00065                 if( !isset( $_SESSION )) {
00066                         session_start();
00067                 }
00068                 if ( !empty($_SESSION[$this->session]) && !$id ) {
00069                         $this->loadUser( $_SESSION[$this->session] );
00070                 } elseif(!empty($_SESSION[$this->session]) && $id) {
00071                         $this->loadUser($id);
00072                 }
00073         }

00082         public function login($username, $password, $loadUser = true) {
00083                 $password = $this->encrypt($password);
00084                 $q = new sQuery();
00085                 $q->from($this->table);
00086                 $q->addWhere($this->fields['username'], $username);
00087                 $q->addWhere($this->fields['password'], $password);
00088                 $q->setLimit(1);
00089                 $user = $q->selectRow();
00090                 if(empty($user)){
00091                         $this->error('The username/password combination that you entered does not exist');
00092                         return false;
00093                 }
00094                 if ( $loadUser ) {
00095                         $this->userData = $user;
00096                         $this->userId = $this->userData[$this->fields['id']];
00097                         $_SESSION[$this->session] = $this->userId;
00098                 }
00099                 //if we are tracking the number of logins
00100                 if(isset($this->fields['logins']) && isset($this->userData[$this->fields['logins']])){
00101                         $q = new sQuery();
00102                         $q->from($this->table);
00103                         $this->userData[$this->fields['logins']] += 1;
00104                         $q->addField($this->fields['logins'], $this->userData[$this->fields['logins']]);
00105                         $q->addWhere($this->fields['id'], $this->userData[$this->fields['id']]);
00106                         $q->update();
00107                 }
00108                 return true;
00109         }
00110 
00116         public function logout($redirectTo = '') {
00117                 if(isset($_SESSION[$this->session])){
00118                         unset($_SESSION[$this->session]);
00119                 }
00120                 $this->userData = array();
00121                 $this->userId = '';
00122                 return true;
00123         }
00124 
00130         public function  __get($name) {
00131                 if (empty($this->userId)) {
00132                         $this->error('No user is loaded');
00133                 }
00134                 if (!isset($this->userData[$name])) {
00135                         $this->error('Unknown property <b>'.$name.'</b>');
00136                 }
00137                 return $this->userData[$name];
00138         }

00144         public function getUserData(){
00145                 if (empty($this->userId)) {
00146                         $this->error('Cannot get user data. No user is loaded');
00147                 }
00148                 return $this->userData;

00165         public function loggedIn() {
00166                 return isset($this->userId) && $this->userId && !empty($this->userData);
00167         }

00173         public function activate() {
00174                 if (empty($this->userId)) {
00175                         $this->error('No user is loaded');
00176                 }
00177                 if ( $this->is_active()) {
00178                         $this->error('Allready active account');
00179                 }
00180                 $q = new sQuery();
00181                 $q->from($this->table);
00182                 $q->addField($this->fields['active'], 1);
00183                 $q->addWhere($this->fields['id'], $this->userId);
00184                 $q->setLimit(1);
00185                 if ($q->update() == 1) {
00186                         $this->userData[$this->fields['active']] = true;
00187                         return true;
00188                 }
00189                 return false;
00190         }

00197         public function newUser($data) {
00198                 if (!is_array($data)) {
00199                         $this->error('Data is not an array');
00200                 }
00201                 $data['password'] = $this->encrypt($data['password']);
00202                 $q = new sQuery();
00203                 $q->into($this->table);
00204                 foreach($data as $field=>$value) {
00205                         $q->addField($field, $value);
00206                 }
00207                 $q->insert();
00208                 return $q->lastInsertId();
00209         }

00215         public function randomPass() {
00216                 return base_convert(mt_rand(pow(39, 9), mt_getrandmax()), 10, 26);
00217         }

00223                 return $q->selectEnum();

00231         private function loadUser($userId) {
00232                 $q = new sQuery();
00233                 $q->from($this->table);
00234                 $q->addWhere($this->fields['id'], $userId);
00235                 $q->setLimit(1);
00236                 $this->userData = $q->selectRow();
00237                 if(!$this->userData) {
00238                         $this->error('Could not load user');
00239                 }
00240                 if(count($this->userData) != count($this->fields)){
00241                         $this->error('Your user config field count ('.count($this->fields).') does not match the database field count ('.count($this->userData).')');
00242                 }
00243                 $this->userId = $userId;
00244                 //if we already have a session var we are already logged in and
00245                 //are now loading another user to do something with
00246                 if(!isset($_SESSION[$this->session])){
00247                         $_SESSION[$this->session] = $this->userId;
00248                 }
00249                 return true;
00250         }

00259         private function encrypt($str) {
00260                 if(in_array($this->encryption, $this->encryptionTypes)) {
00261                         if($this->encryption == 'md5') {
00262                                 $str = md5($str.md5($str));
00263                         }
00264                         elseif($this->encryption == 'sha1'){
00265                                 $str = sha1($str.sha1($str));
00266                         }
00267                 //$str = strtoupper($this->encryption) . "('$str')";
00268                 } else {
00269                         $str = "'$str'";
00270                 }
00271                 return $str;
00272         }
